fire" target="_blank">

</ul>

				<time datetime="2017-09-15T14:37:46+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/duterte-likely-suspend-work-classes-sept-21-anticipation-protests-martial-law-anniversary/350781/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>PRESIDENT Rodrigo Duterte will likely suspend classes and government work on September 21 amid a series of protests set in Metro Manila on the 45th anniversary of the declaration of Martial Law by the late president Ferdinand Marcos. aˆ?This early, I am announcing that I am ordering a holiday so&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350776 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-latest-news category-breakingnews" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/nationwide-martial-law-declaration-unlikely-unless-communists-take-rebellion-streets-lorenzana/350776/" title="Nationwide martial law declaration unlikely unless communists take rebellion to streets&#8211;Lorenzana" itemprop="url">Nationwide martial law declaration unlikely unless communists take rebellion to streets&#8211;Lorenzana</a></h2>
									<span class="posted-by">By 
						<span class="reviewer" itemprop="author">
							<a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/author/lynette-luna/" title="Posts by The Manila Times" class="author url fn" rel="author">The Manila Times</a>					</span>
					</span>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T14:37:07+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/nationwide-martial-law-declaration-unlikely-unless-communists-take-rebellion-streets-lorenzana/350776/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>A NATIONWIDE declaration of martial law is unlikely, Defense Secretary Delfin Lorenzana said Friday, as he sought to allay public fears over President Rodrigo Duterteaˆ™s statement about not thinking twice to issue a proclamation if the communists would take their rebellion to the streets. aˆ?The President has said it before.&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350775 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-latest-news category-breakingnews" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/marawi-city-rehabilitation-p50b-not-enough-defense-chief/350775/" title="Marawi City rehabilitation up P50B but itaˆ™s aˆ?not enoughaˆ™&#8211;defense chief" itemprop="url">Marawi City rehabilitation up P50B but itaˆ™s aˆ?not enoughaˆ™&#8211;defense chief</a></h2>
									<span class="posted-by">By 
						<span class="reviewer" itemprop="author">
							<a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/author/lynette-luna/" title="Posts by The Manila Times" class="author url fn" rel="author">The Manila Times</a>					</span>
					</span>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T13:17:38+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/marawi-city-rehabilitation-p50b-not-enough-defense-chief/350775/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>THE government will need about P50 billion to rehabilitate war-torn Marawi City, although the amount may not even be enough, Defense Secretary Delfin Lorenzana said on Friday. aˆ?P50 billion, I think, is not enough. If you would see it, you will realize how big the damage the armed conflict has&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350771 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-latest-news category-breakingnews" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/senate-panel-restores-p1-1-b-budget-commission-indigenous-people/350771/" title="Senate panel restores P1.1-B budget for commission on indigenous people" itemprop="url">Senate panel restores P1.1-B budget for commission on indigenous people</a></h2>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T13:14:59+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/senate-panel-restores-p1-1-b-budget-commission-indigenous-people/350771/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>THE Senate finance committee approved on Thursday night the P1.1-billion proposed budget for the National Commission on Indigenous Peoples (NCIP), after the House of Representatives slashed its budget to P1,000. But the approval of NCIPaˆ™s budget by the finance panel did not come without any condition and senators gave officials&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350770 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-latest-news category-breakingnews" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/update-1000-caloocan-policemen-relieved-metro-police-chief/350770/" title="UPDATE: 1,000 Caloocan policemen relieved &#8212; Metro police chief" itemprop="url">UPDATE: 1,000 Caloocan policemen relieved &#8212; Metro police chief</a></h2>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T13:13:54+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/update-1000-caloocan-policemen-relieved-metro-police-chief/350770/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>National Capital Region Police Office Chief Director Oscar Albayalde said on Friday that about 1,000 policemen from the Caloocan City Police district have been relieved and would undergo aˆ?retrainingaˆ?. Albayalde said, however, that the first to go would be those from Stations 2 and 7 and Substation 7. aˆ?The three&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
						
	</div>

		</li><li class="widget col-4 widget_sp_image" id="widget_sp_image-31"><a href="http://www.ips.org/institutional/" target="_self" class="widget_sp_image-image-link"><img width="300" height="134" class="attachment-300x134 aligncenter" style="max-width: 100%;" src="http://cdn.manilatimes.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/logo_IPS-2.jpg" /></a></li>			</ul>
				
		</div>

						<span class="reviewer" itemprop="author">

					</span>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T14:37:46+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/duterte-likely-suspend-work-classes-sept-21-anticipation-protests-martial-law-anniversary/350781/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>PRESIDENT Rodrigo Duterte will likely suspend classes and government work on September 21 amid a series of protests set in Metro Manila on the 45th anniversary of the declaration of Martial Law by the late president Ferdinand Marcos. aˆ?This early, I am announcing that I am ordering a holiday so&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350776 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-latest-news category-breakingnews" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/nationwide-martial-law-declaration-unlikely-unless-communists-take-rebellion-streets-lorenzana/350776/" title="Nationwide martial law declaration unlikely unless communists take rebellion to streets&#8211;Lorenzana" itemprop="url">Nationwide martial law declaration unlikely unless communists take rebellion to streets&#8211;Lorenzana</a></h2>
									<span class="posted-by">By 
						<span class="reviewer" itemprop="author">
							<a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/author/lynette-luna/" title="Posts by The Manila Times" class="author url fn" rel="author">The Manila Times</a>					</span>
					</span>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T14:37:07+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/nationwide-martial-law-declaration-unlikely-unless-communists-take-rebellion-streets-lorenzana/350776/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>A NATIONWIDE declaration of martial law is unlikely, Defense Secretary Delfin Lorenzana said Friday, as he sought to allay public fears over President Rodrigo Duterteaˆ™s statement about not thinking twice to issue a proclamation if the communists would take their rebellion to the streets. aˆ?The President has said it before.&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350775 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-latest-news category-breakingnews" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/marawi-city-rehabilitation-p50b-not-enough-defense-chief/350775/" title="Marawi City rehabilitation up P50B but itaˆ™s aˆ?not enoughaˆ™&#8211;defense chief" itemprop="url">Marawi City rehabilitation up P50B but itaˆ™s aˆ?not enoughaˆ™&#8211;defense chief</a></h2>
									<span class="posted-by">By 
						<span class="reviewer" itemprop="author">
							<a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/author/lynette-luna/" title="Posts by The Manila Times" class="author url fn" rel="author">The Manila Times</a>					</span>
					</span>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T13:17:38+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/marawi-city-rehabilitation-p50b-not-enough-defense-chief/350775/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>THE government will need about P50 billion to rehabilitate war-torn Marawi City, although the amount may not even be enough, Defense Secretary Delfin Lorenzana said on Friday. aˆ?P50 billion, I think, is not enough. If you would see it, you will realize how big the damage the armed conflict has&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350771 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-latest-news category-breakingnews" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/senate-panel-restores-p1-1-b-budget-commission-indigenous-people/350771/" title="Senate panel restores P1.1-B budget for commission on indigenous people" itemprop="url">Senate panel restores P1.1-B budget for commission on indigenous people</a></h2>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T13:14:59+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/senate-panel-restores-p1-1-b-budget-commission-indigenous-people/350771/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>THE Senate finance committee approved on Thursday night the P1.1-billion proposed budget for the National Commission on Indigenous Peoples (NCIP), after the House of Representatives slashed its budget to P1,000. But the approval of NCIPaˆ™s budget by the finance panel did not come without any condition and senators gave officials&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350770 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-latest-news category-breakingnews" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/update-1000-caloocan-policemen-relieved-metro-police-chief/350770/" title="UPDATE: 1,000 Caloocan policemen relieved &#8212; Metro police chief" itemprop="url">UPDATE: 1,000 Caloocan policemen relieved &#8212; Metro police chief</a></h2>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T13:13:54+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/update-1000-caloocan-policemen-relieved-metro-police-chief/350770/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>National Capital Region Police Office Chief Director Oscar Albayalde said on Friday that about 1,000 policemen from the Caloocan City Police district have been relieved and would undergo aˆ?retrainingaˆ?. Albayalde said, however, that the first to go would be those from Stations 2 and 7 and Substation 7. aˆ?The three&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
						
	</div>

Email: newsdesk@manilatimes.net opinion@manilatimes.net</div>
		</li><li class="widget col-4 widget_sp_image" id="widget_sp_image-31"><a href="http://www.ips.org/institutional/" target="_self" class="widget_sp_image-image-link"><img width="300" height="134" class="attachment-300x134 aligncenter" style="max-width: 100%;" src="http://cdn.manilatimes.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/logo_IPS-2.jpg" /></a></li>			</ul>
				
		</div>

								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/update-1000-caloocan-policemen-relieved-metro-police-chief/350770/" title="UPDATE: 1,000 Caloocan policemen relieved &#8212; Metro police chief" itemprop="url">UPDATE: 1,000 Caloocan policemen relieved &#8212; Metro police chief</a></h2>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T13:13:54+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/update-1000-caloocan-policemen-relieved-metro-police-chief/350770/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>National Capital Region Police Office Chief Director Oscar Albayalde said on Friday that about 1,000 policemen from the Caloocan City Police district have been relieved and would undergo aˆ?retrainingaˆ?. Albayalde said, however, that the first to go would be those from Stations 2 and 7 and Substation 7. aˆ?The three&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
						
	</div>
	
	
			
	<div class="main-pagination">
		<span class='page-numbers current'>1</span>
<a class='page-numbers' href='http://www.manilatimes.net/news/page/2/'>2</a>
<a class='page-numbers' href='http://www.manilatimes.net/news/page/3/'>3</a>
<span class="page-numbers dots">&hellip;</span>
<a class='page-numbers' href='http://www.manilatimes.net/news/page/3473/'>3,473</a>

		</div>

		<h3 class="section-head prominent cat-text-53">World</h3>

			</div>

		<h3 class="section-head prominent cat-text-43">Business</h3>

		
	<div class="row listing meta-above">
		
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350747 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-business" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/stock-market-hits-new-time-highs/350747/" title="Stock market hits new all-time highs" itemprop="url">Stock market hits new all-time highs</a></h2>
									<span class="posted-by">By 
						<span class="reviewer" itemprop="author">
							<a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/author/angelica-ballesteros/" title="Posts by ANGELICA BALLESTEROS, TMT" class="author url fn" rel="author">ANGELICA BALLESTEROS, TMT</a>					</span>
					</span>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T01:29:42+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/stock-market-hits-new-time-highs/350747/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>The stock market hit new record highs on Thursday with analysts noting continued investor confidence ahead of the end of the so-called aˆ?ghostaˆ? month. The Philippine Stock Exchange index (PSEi) gained 1.13 percent and broke past the 8,100 resistance level to close at 8,144.91, a new all-time high. The previous&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350746 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-business" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/peso-slips-back-p511-level/350746/" title="Peso slips back to P51:$1 level" itemprop="url">Peso slips back to P51:$1 level</a></h2>
									<span class="posted-by">By 
						<span class="reviewer" itemprop="author">
							<a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/author/mayvellin-caravallo/" title="Posts by MAYVELIN U. CARABALLO, TMT" class="author url fn" rel="author">MAYVELIN U. CARABALLO, TMT</a>					</span>
					</span>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T01:28:38+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/peso-slips-back-p511-level/350746/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>The peso fell back into P51:$1 territory on Thursday on the likelihood of a fresh US Federal Reserve rate hike. aˆ?The peso depreciated today as an upbeat US report on producer prices keeps open the possibility of another US rate hike this year,aˆ? Land Bank of the Philippines market economist&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350745 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-business" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/investor-wariness-leads-net-hot-money-outflows/350745/" title="Investor wariness leads to net hot money outflows" itemprop="url">Investor wariness leads to net hot money outflows</a></h2>
									<span class="posted-by">By 
						<span class="reviewer" itemprop="author">
							<a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/author/mayvellin-caravallo/" title="Posts by MAYVELIN U. CARABALLO, TMT" class="author url fn" rel="author">MAYVELIN U. CARABALLO, TMT</a>					</span>
					</span>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T01:27:54+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/investor-wariness-leads-net-hot-money-outflows/350745/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>Political developments here and abroad led to a reversal in foreign portfolio investment (FPI) flows last month, the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP) reported on Thursday. So-called aˆ?hot moneyaˆ? saw a net outflow of $58 million in August, the largest since Mayaˆ™s $24.35 million, central bank data showed. A year&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350744 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-business" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/ph-seek-japanese-support-infra-deals/350744/" title="PH to seek Japanese support for infra deals" itemprop="url">PH to seek Japanese support for infra deals</a></h2>
									<span class="posted-by">By 
						<span class="reviewer" itemprop="author">
							<a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/author/mayvellin-caravallo/" title="Posts by MAYVELIN U. CARABALLO, TMT" class="author url fn" rel="author">MAYVELIN U. CARABALLO, TMT</a>					</span>
					</span>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T01:26:35+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/ph-seek-japanese-support-infra-deals/350744/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>The countryaˆ™s economic managers will meet with Japanese officials later this month to discuss ways to speed up implementation of the governmentaˆ™s flagship infrastructure projects, the Finance department said. The aˆ?Philippines-Japan High-Level Committee on Infrastructure and Economic Cooperationaˆ? meeting, to take place in Tokyo from September 25 to 26, will&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">

				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/duterte-likely-suspend-work-classes-sept-21-anticipation-protests-martial-law-anniversary/350781/" title="Duterte likely to suspend work, classes on Sept. 21 in anticipation of protests on Martial Law anniversary" itemprop="url">Duterte likely to suspend work, classes on Sept. 21 in anticipation of protests on Martial Law anniversary</a></h2>

						<span class="reviewer" itemprop="author">

					</span>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T14:37:46+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/duterte-likely-suspend-work-classes-sept-21-anticipation-protests-martial-law-anniversary/350781/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>PRESIDENT Rodrigo Duterte will likely suspend classes and government work on September 21 amid a series of protests set in Metro Manila on the 45th anniversary of the declaration of Martial Law by the late president Ferdinand Marcos. aˆ?This early, I am announcing that I am ordering a holiday so&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350776 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-latest-news category-breakingnews" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/nationwide-martial-law-declaration-unlikely-unless-communists-take-rebellion-streets-lorenzana/350776/" title="Nationwide martial law declaration unlikely unless communists take rebellion to streets&#8211;Lorenzana" itemprop="url">Nationwide martial law declaration unlikely unless communists take rebellion to streets&#8211;Lorenzana</a></h2>
									<span class="posted-by">By 
						<span class="reviewer" itemprop="author">
							<a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/author/lynette-luna/" title="Posts by The Manila Times" class="author url fn" rel="author">The Manila Times</a>					</span>
					</span>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T14:37:07+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/nationwide-martial-law-declaration-unlikely-unless-communists-take-rebellion-streets-lorenzana/350776/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>A NATIONWIDE declaration of martial law is unlikely, Defense Secretary Delfin Lorenzana said Friday, as he sought to allay public fears over President Rodrigo Duterteaˆ™s statement about not thinking twice to issue a proclamation if the communists would take their rebellion to the streets. aˆ?The President has said it before.&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350775 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-latest-news category-breakingnews" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/marawi-city-rehabilitation-p50b-not-enough-defense-chief/350775/" title="Marawi City rehabilitation up P50B but itaˆ™s aˆ?not enoughaˆ™&#8211;defense chief" itemprop="url">Marawi City rehabilitation up P50B but itaˆ™s aˆ?not enoughaˆ™&#8211;defense chief</a></h2>
									<span class="posted-by">By 
						<span class="reviewer" itemprop="author">
							<a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/author/lynette-luna/" title="Posts by The Manila Times" class="author url fn" rel="author">The Manila Times</a>					</span>
					</span>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T13:17:38+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/marawi-city-rehabilitation-p50b-not-enough-defense-chief/350775/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>THE government will need about P50 billion to rehabilitate war-torn Marawi City, although the amount may not even be enough, Defense Secretary Delfin Lorenzana said on Friday. aˆ?P50 billion, I think, is not enough. If you would see it, you will realize how big the damage the armed conflict has&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350771 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-latest-news category-breakingnews" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/senate-panel-restores-p1-1-b-budget-commission-indigenous-people/350771/" title="Senate panel restores P1.1-B budget for commission on indigenous people" itemprop="url">Senate panel restores P1.1-B budget for commission on indigenous people</a></h2>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T13:14:59+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/senate-panel-restores-p1-1-b-budget-commission-indigenous-people/350771/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>THE Senate finance committee approved on Thursday night the P1.1-billion proposed budget for the National Commission on Indigenous Peoples (NCIP), after the House of Representatives slashed its budget to P1,000. But the approval of NCIPaˆ™s budget by the finance panel did not come without any condition and senators gave officials&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
					
		<div class="column half">
		
			<article class="highlights post-350770 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-latest-news category-breakingnews" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
				
								<span class="posted-by lead-line"></span>
				<h2 itemprop="name headline"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/update-1000-caloocan-policemen-relieved-metro-police-chief/350770/" title="UPDATE: 1,000 Caloocan policemen relieved &#8212; Metro police chief" itemprop="url">UPDATE: 1,000 Caloocan policemen relieved &#8212; Metro police chief</a></h2>
											<div class="cf listing-meta meta above">
					
				<time datetime="2017-09-15T13:13:54+08:00" itemprop="datePublished" class="meta-item">September 15, 2017</time><span class="meta-item comments"><a href="http://www.manilatimes.net/update-1000-caloocan-policemen-relieved-metro-police-chief/350770/#respond"><i class="fa fa-comments-o"></i> 0</a></span>					
			</div>
										
				<div class="excerpt"><p>National Capital Region Police Office Chief Director Oscar Albayalde said on Friday that about 1,000 policemen from the Caloocan City Police district have been relieved and would undergo aˆ?retrainingaˆ?. Albayalde said, however, that the first to go would be those from Stations 2 and 7 and Substation 7. aˆ?The three&hellip;</p>
</div>
			
			</article>
		</div>
			
						
	</div>

Email: newsdesk@manilatimes.net opinion@manilatimes.net</div>
		</li><li class="widget col-4 widget_sp_image" id="widget_sp_image-31"><a href="http://www.ips.org/institutional/" target="_self" class="widget_sp_image-image-link"><img width="300" height="134" class="attachment-300x134 aligncenter" style="max-width: 100%;" src="http://cdn.manilatimes.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/logo_IPS-2.jpg" /></a></li>			</ul>

<script>
(function($){

    // get the images of the gallery and replace it by a canvas of the same size to fix the problem with overlapping images on load.
    $('img[width][height]:not(.uk-overlay-panel)', $('#wk-grid33e')).each(function() {

        var $img = $(this);

        if (this.width == 'auto' || this.height == 'auto' || !$img.is(':visible')) {
            return;
        }

        var $canvas = $('<canvas class="uk-responsive-width"></canvas>').attr({width:$img.attr('width'), height:$img.attr('height')}),
            img = new Image,
            release = function() {
                $canvas.remove();
                $img.css('display', '');
                release = function(){};
            };

        $img.css('display', 'none').after($canvas);

        $(img).on('load', function(){ release(); });
        setTimeout(function(){ release(); }, 1000);

        img.src = this.src;

    });

})(jQuery);
</script>

</div>

<script>
(function($){

    // get the images of the gallery and replace it by a canvas of the same size to fix the problem with overlapping images on load.
    $('img[width][height]:not(.uk-overlay-panel)', $('#wk-grid7c8')).each(function() {

        var $img = $(this);

        if (this.width == 'auto' || this.height == 'auto' || !$img.is(':visible')) {
            return;
        }

        var $canvas = $('<canvas class="uk-responsive-width"></canvas>').attr({width:$img.attr('width'), height:$img.attr('height')}),
            img = new Image,
            release = function() {
                $canvas.remove();
                $img.css('display', '');
                release = function(){};
            };

        $img.css('display', 'none').after($canvas);

        $(img).on('load', function(){ release(); });
        setTimeout(function(){ release(); }, 1000);

        img.src = this.src;

    });

})(jQuery);
</script>

</div>
            
            
            
            
            
        </div>
    </li>

</ul>

    
</div>

</div></div>

                                    September 14, 2017

                        <div class="uk-margin"><ul class="uk-list">

<script>
(function($){

    // get the images of the gallery and replace it by a canvas of the same size to fix the problem with overlapping images on load.
    $('img[width][height]:not(.uk-overlay-panel)', $('#wk-grid74d')).each(function() {

        var $img = $(this);

        if (this.width == 'auto' || this.height == 'auto' || !$img.is(':visible')) {
            return;
        }

        var $canvas = $('<canvas class="uk-responsive-width"></canvas>').attr({width:$img.attr('width'), height:$img.attr('height')}),
            img = new Image,
            release = function() {
                $canvas.remove();
                $img.css('display', '');
                release = function(){};
            };

        $img.css('display', 'none').after($canvas);

        $(img).on('load', function(){ release(); });
        setTimeout(function(){ release(); }, 1000);

        img.src = this.src;

    });

})(jQuery);
</script>
</div>
</div>
        
        
        
        
    </div>

<script>
(function($){

    // get the images of the gallery and replace it by a canvas of the same size to fix the problem with overlapping images on load.
    $('img[width][height]:not(.uk-overlay-panel)', $('#wk-grid33e')).each(function() {

        var $img = $(this);

        if (this.width == 'auto' || this.height == 'auto' || !$img.is(':visible')) {
            return;
        }

        var $canvas = $('<canvas class="uk-responsive-width"></canvas>').attr({width:$img.attr('width'), height:$img.attr('height')}),
            img = new Image,
            release = function() {
                $canvas.remove();
                $img.css('display', '');
                release = function(){};
            };

        $img.css('display', 'none').after($canvas);

        $(img).on('load', function(){ release(); });
        setTimeout(function(){ release(); }, 1000);

        img.src = this.src;

    });

})(jQuery);
</script>

</div>

<script>
(function($){

    // get the images of the gallery and replace it by a canvas of the same size to fix the problem with overlapping images on load.
    $('img[width][height]:not(.uk-overlay-panel)', $('#wk-grid7c8')).each(function() {

        var $img = $(this);

        if (this.width == 'auto' || this.height == 'auto' || !$img.is(':visible')) {
            return;
        }

        var $canvas = $('<canvas class="uk-responsive-width"></canvas>').attr({width:$img.attr('width'), height:$img.attr('height')}),
            img = new Image,
            release = function() {
                $canvas.remove();
                $img.css('display', '');
                release = function(){};
            };

        $img.css('display', 'none').after($canvas);

        $(img).on('load', function(){ release(); });
        setTimeout(function(){ release(); }, 1000);

        img.src = this.src;

    });

})(jQuery);
</script>

</div>
            
            
            
            
            
        </div>

</ul>

<div id="column-content">
	aˆ?We need sustained and relentless efforts at going after smugglers, and it should not end with the seizure of goods smuggled: It must ultimately end up in placing smugglers behind bars. aˆ“ Senator Pangilinanaˆ™

    <div id="block-block-10" class="block block-block">

    <h2>About Malaya</h2>
  
  <div class="content">
    <p>Malaya Business Insight's weekday sections treat readers to timely articles on shipping, banking, information and technology, automotive and motoring, real estate and property development, travel and tourism and people and sectoral events. Special issues and supplements are designed to enrich current information and data files of readers with pre-selected topics of national and local significance.</p>

<div class="views-field-view-node"><a href="http://malaya.com.ph/content/about-malaya">Read more a†’</a></div>

<p>A </p>
  </div>
</div>

    <h2>Column of the Day</h2>
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="view view-column-of-the-day view-id-column_of_the_day view-display-id-block view-dom-id-2306e80452acb909156eaeaef8e5ef95">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-body">        <div class="field-content"><h3 id="column-title">
    	<a href="/business-news/opinion/what-names-garlic-cartel">What names in that garlic cartel?</a>
</h3>
<div id="column-author">
	<div id="column-picture">
		<img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.malaya.com.ph/sites/default/files/styles/user-thumbnail-special/public/pictures/picture-41-1378188601.jpg?itok=RGVOUv65" width="90" height="90" alt="" />
	</div>

</div>


<div id="column-info-wrapper">
<div id="column-info">
		By DAHLI ASPILLERA | September 15,2017<br>
	</div>
<div id="column-content">
	aˆ?We need sustained and relentless efforts at going after smugglers, and it should not end with the seizure of goods smuggled: It must ultimately end up in placing smugglers behind bars. aˆ“ Senator Pangilinanaˆ™
</div>

</div>


</div>  </div>

<div id="block-views-column-of-the-day-block-1" class="block block-views">

    <h2>Opinion of the Day</h2>
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="view view-column-of-the-day view-id-column_of_the_day view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-bf3ecc35fb9e939822e889063b0ec2bb">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-body">        <div class="field-content"><h3 id="column-title">
    	<a href="/business-news/opinion/chr-explained">CHR explained</a>
</h3>
<div id="column-author">
	<div id="column-picture">
		<img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.malaya.com.ph/sites/default/files/styles/user-thumbnail-special/public/pictures/picture-42-1378188646.jpg?itok=SWPuerk4" width="90" height="90" alt="" />
	</div>

</div>


<div id="column-info-wrapper">
<div id="column-info">
		By ELLEN TORDESILLAS | September 15, 2017<br>
	</div>
<div id="column-content">
	aˆ?Some of the congressmen who voted to reduce the CHR budget have started explaining their vote and they all showed their ignorance of the mandate of the CHR.aˆ™
</div>

</div>

					<div class="nspArts right" style="width:52%;">
														<div class="nspArt" style="width:100%;"><div style="padding:0 10px 0 0"><h4 class="nspHeader tleft fnone"><a href="/sports/item/8866-adairsville-lone-winner-in-county-softball" title="Adairsville lone winner in county softball">Adairsville lone winner in county softball</a></h4><p class="nspText tleft fleft">&nbsp;

</p><p class="nspInfo  tleft fleft"></p></div></div>
			</div>
						<div class="nspLinksWrap right" style="width:47.9%;">
			<div class="nspLinks" style="margin:0 0 0 5px;">

	<!-- This script takes the headers on the front page and turns them into links to those sections -->
<script>
jQuery(document).ready(function() {
   var newsLink = jQuery("#menu321").attr("href");
   var sportsLink = jQuery("#menu323").attr("href");
   var obitsLink = jQuery("#menu677").attr("href");
   var specialSectionsLink = jQuery(".item-747 a").attr("href");
   var newsSpan = jQuery(".news-header h3").html();
   var sportsSpan = jQuery(".sports-header h3").html();
   var obitsSpan = jQuery(".obituaries-header h3").html();
   var specialSectionsSpan = jQuery(".special-sections h3").html();
   jQuery(".news-header h3").html("<a title='News' href='" + newsLink + "'>" + newsSpan + "</a>");
   jQuery(".sports-header h3").html("<a title='News' href='" + sportsLink + "'>" + sportsSpan + "</a>");
   jQuery(".obituaries-header h3").html("<a title='News' href='" + obitsLink + "'>" + obitsSpan + "</a>");
   jQuery(".special-sections h3").html("<a title='News' href='" + specialSectionsLink + "'>" + specialSectionsSpan + "</a>");
   /*var headers = jQuery("h3.header");
   console.log("JGM -- headers.length = " + headers.length);

    <!-- #region Jssor Slider Begin -->

    <!-- This code works with jquery library. -->
    <script src="sites/all/themes/newsplus/ninjaslider/js/jquery-1.11.3.min.js" type="text/javascript" data-library="jquery" data-version="1.11.3"></script>
    <script src="sites/all/themes/newsplus/ninjaslider/js/jssor.slider-22.0.15.mini.js" type="text/javascript" data-library="jssor.slider.mini" data-version="22.0.15"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {

            /**
        	* Replace elements with slideshow details before initializing jssor slide - Chi Rilo - jan 10, 2017
        	*/
        	var ctr = 1;
			var slides_arr = [];
			$('#slideshow_block_8 .flexslider .slides li').each(function(e){
				var slide_title = $(this).find('div.net-slideshow-title a').text();
				var slide_link = $(this).find('div.views-field-field-mt-teaser-image a').attr('href');
				var slide_img_src = $(this).find('.views-field-field-mt-teaser-image img').attr('src');
				var slide_date_created = $(this).find('#slick-created').text();
                                var slide_category = $(this).find('div.views-field-field-mt-post-categories a').text();
				
				//var slides_arr = [];
				slides_arr['slide_'+ctr] = [slide_title, slide_link, slide_img_src, slide_date_created, slide_category];
				//console.log(slides_arr['slide_'+ctr]);


				var this_slide = 'slide_'+ctr;
				//console.log(this_slide);
				//console.log(slides_arr[this_slide][0]);

				var this_data_image = $(slides_arr['slide_'+ctr]).find('[data-u] img').attr('src');
				var this_slide_title = $(slides_arr['slide_'+ctr]).find('big_title').text();

				$('#'+this_slide).find('[data-u] img').attr('src', slides_arr[this_slide][2]);	// thumbnail image
				$('#'+this_slide).find("[data-u=image]").attr('src', slides_arr[this_slide][2]); // main slide image
				//$('#'+this_slide).find('.big_title').text(slides_arr[this_slide][0]); // slide big_title
				$('#'+this_slide).find('.big_title').html('<a style="text-decoration: none;" href="'+slides_arr[this_slide][1]+'">'+slides_arr[this_slide][0]+'</a>'); // slide big_title
				$('#'+this_slide).find('[data-u=thumb] .thumbnavigator_inner li.title').html('<a href="'+slides_arr[this_slide][1]+'">'+slides_arr[this_slide][0]+'</a>');
                                $('#'+this_slide).find('[data-u=thumb] .thumbnavigator_inner li.topic').html('<h4 style="font-size: 14px;">'+slides_arr[this_slide][4]+'</h4>'); // topic

                                $('#'+this_slide).attr('data-href', slides_arr[this_slide][1]); // adds data-href to slide
				$('#'+this_slide).on('click', function(e){
					//alert( $(this).attr('data-href') );
					window.location.href = 'http://www.sunstar.com.ph'+$(this).attr('data-href');
				});

				ctr++;
			});

            var jssor_1_options = {
				$AutoPlay: false,
				$Idle: 10000,
				$ArrowNavigatorOptions: {
					$Class: $JssorArrowNavigator$,
					$ChanceToShow: 0, // temporarily hidden
					$Scale: true
				},
				$BulletNavigatorOptions: {
					$Class: $JssorBulletNavigator$,
					$AutoCenter: 1,
					$Scale: true,
					$ChanceToShow: 2	
				},
				$ThumbnailNavigatorOptions: {
					$Class: $JssorThumbnailNavigator$,
					/*$Cols: 4,*/
					$Cols: 4,
					$SpacingX: 4,
					$SpacingY: 4,
					$Orientation: 2,
					$Align: 0
				}
            };

            var jssor_1_slider = new $JssorSlider$("jssor_1", jssor_1_options);

            /*responsive code begin*/
            /*you can remove responsive code if you don't want the slider scales while window resizing*/
            function ScaleSlider() {
                var refSize = jssor_1_slider.$Elmt.parentNode.clientWidth;
                if (refSize) {
                    refSize = Math.min(refSize, 1300);
                    jssor_1_slider.$ScaleWidth(refSize);
                }
                else {
                    window.setTimeout(ScaleSlider, 30);
                }
            }
            ScaleSlider();
            $(window).bind("load", ScaleSlider);
            $(window).bind("resize", ScaleSlider);
            $(window).bind("orientationchange", ScaleSlider);
            /*responsive code end*/


            $( ".tp img" ).each(function() {
			  var attr = $(this).attr('src');
			  var img_src = attr.split('-'); // img_src[1] will be used as src
			  var bg_src = 'img/'+img_src[1];

			  //console.log(attr);
			  if (typeof attr !== typeof undefined && attr !== false) {
			     // $(this).parent().css('background-image', 'url('+bg_src+')'); // working
			      $(this).parent().css({'background':'url('+attr+')', 'background-size':'cover'});
			      //console.log(attr);
			  }

			});

			$("[data-p] img").each(function(e){
				var slide_img = $(this).attr('src');
				$(this).css({'width':'860px', 'height':'450px'});
			});
                        // Slideshow Title 
		        $(".big_title").css({'margin-top' : '470px', 'margin-left' : '20px', 'text-align' : 'center'});
        });
    </script>

  <div class="content">
    <div  id="quicktabs-custom_channel_qt" class="quicktabs-wrapper quicktabs-style-nostyle"><div class="item-list"><ul class="quicktabs-tabs quicktabs-style-nostyle"><li class="active first last"><a href="/node?qt-custom_channel_qt=0#qt-custom_channel_qt" id="quicktabs-tab-custom_channel_qt-0" class="quicktabs-tab quicktabs-tab-block quicktabs-tab-block-block-delta-31 active">In Case You Missed It</a></li>
</ul></div><div id="quicktabs-container-custom_channel_qt" class="quicktabs_main quicktabs-style-nostyle"><div  id="quicktabs-tabpage-custom_channel_qt-0" class="quicktabs-tabpage "><div id="block-block-31" class="block block-block clearfix">

    
  <div class="content">
    <p><img src="http://www.sunstar.com.ph/sites/default/files/field/image/article/europe2_0.jpg" width="360" height="200" alt="Of castles and fairytales" /></p>
<div class="menu_simple">
<h4><a href="http://www.sunstar.com.ph/cebu/lifestyle/2017/09/13/castles-and-fairytales-563965">Of castles and fairytales</a></h4>
<hr class="sidebar_line" /><a href="http://www.sunstar.com.ph/cebu/lifestyle/2017/09/13/its-been-35-years-costabellas-appeal-563964" target="_parent">Itaˆ™s been 35 years of Costabellaaˆ™s appeal</a>
<hr class="sidebar_line" /><a href="http://www.sunstar.com.ph/davao/lifestyle/2017/09/12/cooking-101-thai-sticky-rice-mango-563773">Cooking 101: Thai sticky rice with mango</a>

    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).on('copy', function(e)
    {
      var sel = window.getSelection();
      var copyFooter = 
            "<br /><br /> Read more: <a href='" + document.location.href + "'>" + document.location.href + "</a><br />Follow us: @sunstaronline on Twitter | SunStar Philippines on Facebook";
      var copyHolder = $('<div>', {html: sel+copyFooter, style: {position: 'absolute', left: '-99999px'}});
      $('body').append(copyHolder);
      sel.selectAllChildren( copyHolder[0] );
      window.setTimeout(function() {
          copyHolder.remove();
      },0);
    });
    </script>
  
<script type="text/javascript">
$( document ).ready(function() {

  /* Open new tab when Menu is clicked - Chirilo July 8, 2017 */
  $('#main-navigation ul.menu li a.sf-depth-2').on('click', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();
    $(this).attr('target', '_blank');
    window.open( $(this).attr('href') );
  });

  $('.slider-for').slick({
    slidesToShow: 1,
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    arrows: false,
    fade: true,
    asNavFor: '.slider-nav'
  });
  $('.slider-nav').slick({
    slidesToShow: 3,
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    asNavFor: '.slider-for',
    dots: true,
    centerMode: true,
    focusOnSelect: true
  });

  //console.log(document.location.href+'feature');

  /*  UPDATED - Stopped implementation - Chirilo March 14, 2017 */
  /* Check if url if <front> if true, show ICYMI popup  - Chirilo Nov 4, 2016*/
  //if(window.location.href.indexOf("/") > -1 || window.location.href.indexOf("latest-news") > -1 ) {
  
  //console.log(thiscurrentpath);
  /* UPDATED - ICYMI Removal to be replaced with Mobile Ambient Ad - Chirilo March 23, 2017 */
  //var isfrontpage = '';
    // if on  mobile, show icymi pop up - Chirilo March 23, 2017
    //if( isfrontpage === 'yes' && isfrontpage !== null ){
    var thiscurrentpath = "node";
    if( thiscurrentpath === 'taxonomy/term/6' || thiscurrentpath === 'taxonomy/term/12' || thiscurrentpath === 'taxonomy/term/13' ) {
    
      var popupstate = localStorage.getCacheItem("popUpState");
      
      //if(localStorage.getItem('popState') != 'shown'){
        if( popupstate == null ){
          $('.various').removeAttr('style');
          $(".various").fancybox({
            maxWidth  : 360,
            maxHeight : 700,
            fitToView : true,
            width   : '360px',
            height    : '100%',
            autoSize  : true,
            closeClick  : false,
            openEffect  : 'none',
            closeEffect : 'none'
          });
          $(".various").click();

          $('.various a').each(function(){
            $(this).attr('style', 'cursor: pointer;');
            $(this).on('click', function(e){
              e.preventDefault();
              var this_url = $(this).attr('href');
              window.open(this_url);
              $('.fancybox-close').trigger('click');
            });
          });
          localStorage.setCacheItem("popUpState", "shown", { days: 1 });
      }
      // Add event handle for the ICYMI quicktab to redirect to url=/icymi on click - Chirilo Nov 7, 2016
      $('#quicktabs-tab-custom_channel_qt-0').on('click', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
        var thisquicktab = $(this).text();
        var icymiurl = $(location).attr('href')+'icymi';
        
        if( thisquicktab === "In Case You Missed It" ){
          window.open(icymiurl);
        }
      });

      // close this dialog after 5 seconds - Chirilo 
      setTimeout(function(){
        $('.fancybox-close').trigger('click');
      }, 5000);
    }
  /* EOF: UPDATED - ICYMI Removal to be replaced with Mobile Ambient Ad - Chirilo March 23, 2017 */
  

  /* ICYMI - Dirty fix for showing specific logo on ICYMI page */
  var newthispath = "node";
  if(newthispath == 'node/509359'){
    var asd = $("#logo img").attr('src');
    var newsrc = '/sites/default/files/field/image/icymi/ICYMI_logo.png';
    $('#logo img').attr('src', '/sites/default/files/field/image/icymi/ICYMI_logo.png');
  }

  /*  Religion  Taxonomy Term Page - Dec 27, 2016 - Chi Rilo */
  /*if( newthispath == 'taxonomy/term/3743' ) {
    var asd = $("#logo img").attr('src');
    var newsrc = '/sites/default/files/field/image/religion/religion-logo.png';
    $('#logo img').attr('src', '/sites/default/files/field/image/religion/religion-logo-black.png');
  }*/


  /* Slick Slideshow Thumbnail and Caption Link - Chirilo September 19, 2016 */
  $('#slick-views-slideshow-1-thumbnail .slick-list div.slick__slide').each(function(){
      $(this).on('click', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
      });
      $(this).on('dblclick', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
        var link = 'http://www.sunstar.com.ph'+$(this).children('a').attr('href');
        window.open(
          link,
          '_blank' // <- This is what makes it open in a new window.
        );
      });
  });

  /* Disqus - This is the script which loads the Disqus comments/comments thread on element show-comments click - Chirilo September 9, 2016 */
  $('.show-comments').on('click', function(){
      // show fb and disclaimer
      $('.fb-comments').show();

      var disqus_shortname = 'sunstarphilippines'; // Replace this value with *your* username.

      // ajax request to load the disqus javascript
      $.ajax({
        type: "GET",
        url: "http://" + disqus_shortname + ".disqus.com/embed.js",
        dataType: "script",
        cache: true
      });
      // hide the button once comments load
      $(this).fadeOut();
  });

  
  /* animate showing of nav header to avoid showing placing of elements dynamically - Chi Jan 20, 2017 */
  $('#nav_desktop').hide();
  setTimeout(function(){
      if( $('#nav_desktop').is(':hidden') ) {
        $('#nav_desktop').fadeIn('slow');

        /*$('#block-dfp-1b99f74c7ce6a32e1d06c4c0bd684f02').css('text-align', 'center');
        $('#block-dfp-caf1362dfad37c56de57d5dcad89cb63').css({'text-align': 'center', 'margin-top':'10px', 'padding':'0px'});*/        
      }
  },3000);


  
  setTimeout(function(){
      $('#block-dfp-caf1362dfad37c56de57d5dcad89cb63').css({'text-align': 'center', 'margin-top':'10px', 'padding':'0px'});
      $('#block-dfp-caf1362dfad37c56de57d5dcad89cb63').fadeIn('slow');
      
      $('#block-dfp-1b99f74c7ce6a32e1d06c4c0bd684f02').css('text-align', 'center');
      $('#block-dfp-1b99f74c7ce6a32e1d06c4c0bd684f02').fadeIn('slow');

      /* DFP tag: Right_Content_Cebu_300x250' block */
      $('#block-dfp-right-content-cebu-300x250').css({'text-align': 'center', 'margin-top':'10px', 'padding':'0px'});
      $('#block-dfp-right-content-cebu-300x250').fadeIn('slow');

      /* DFP tag: Right_Content_LandingPages_300x250 block */

  },3000);


  var mediaQueryTemplate = '\
  @media (max-width:767px) { \
      #nav_desktop{ display: none !important } \
  } \
  ';


});

    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).on('copy', function(e)
    {
      var sel = window.getSelection();
      var copyFooter = 
            "<br /><br /> Read more: <a href='" + document.location.href + "'>" + document.location.href + "</a><br />Follow us: @sunstaronline on Twitter | SunStar Philippines on Facebook";
      var copyHolder = $('<div>', {html: sel+copyFooter, style: {position: 'absolute', left: '-99999px'}});
      $('body').append(copyHolder);
      sel.selectAllChildren( copyHolder[0] );
      window.setTimeout(function() {
          copyHolder.remove();
      },0);
    });
    </script>
  
<script type="text/javascript">
$( document ).ready(function() {

  /* Open new tab when Menu is clicked - Chirilo July 8, 2017 */
  $('#main-navigation ul.menu li a.sf-depth-2').on('click', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();
    $(this).attr('target', '_blank');
    window.open( $(this).attr('href') );
  });

  $('.slider-for').slick({
    slidesToShow: 1,
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    arrows: false,
    fade: true,
    asNavFor: '.slider-nav'
  });
  $('.slider-nav').slick({
    slidesToShow: 3,
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    asNavFor: '.slider-for',
    dots: true,
    centerMode: true,
    focusOnSelect: true
  });

  //console.log(document.location.href+'feature');

  /*  UPDATED - Stopped implementation - Chirilo March 14, 2017 */
  /* Check if url if <front> if true, show ICYMI popup  - Chirilo Nov 4, 2016*/
  //if(window.location.href.indexOf("/") > -1 || window.location.href.indexOf("latest-news") > -1 ) {
  
  //console.log(thiscurrentpath);
  /* UPDATED - ICYMI Removal to be replaced with Mobile Ambient Ad - Chirilo March 23, 2017 */
  //var isfrontpage = '';
    // if on  mobile, show icymi pop up - Chirilo March 23, 2017
    //if( isfrontpage === 'yes' && isfrontpage !== null ){
    var thiscurrentpath = "node";
    if( thiscurrentpath === 'taxonomy/term/6' || thiscurrentpath === 'taxonomy/term/12' || thiscurrentpath === 'taxonomy/term/13' ) {
    
      var popupstate = localStorage.getCacheItem("popUpState");
      
      //if(localStorage.getItem('popState') != 'shown'){
        if( popupstate == null ){
          $('.various').removeAttr('style');
          $(".various").fancybox({
            maxWidth  : 360,
            maxHeight : 700,
            fitToView : true,
            width   : '360px',
            height    : '100%',
            autoSize  : true,
            closeClick  : false,
            openEffect  : 'none',
            closeEffect : 'none'
          });
          $(".various").click();

          $('.various a').each(function(){
            $(this).attr('style', 'cursor: pointer;');
            $(this).on('click', function(e){
              e.preventDefault();
              var this_url = $(this).attr('href');
              window.open(this_url);
              $('.fancybox-close').trigger('click');
            });
          });
          localStorage.setCacheItem("popUpState", "shown", { days: 1 });
      }
      // Add event handle for the ICYMI quicktab to redirect to url=/icymi on click - Chirilo Nov 7, 2016
      $('#quicktabs-tab-custom_channel_qt-0').on('click', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
        var thisquicktab = $(this).text();
        var icymiurl = $(location).attr('href')+'icymi';
        
        if( thisquicktab === "In Case You Missed It" ){
          window.open(icymiurl);
        }
      });

      // close this dialog after 5 seconds - Chirilo 
      setTimeout(function(){
        $('.fancybox-close').trigger('click');
      }, 5000);
    }
  /* EOF: UPDATED - ICYMI Removal to be replaced with Mobile Ambient Ad - Chirilo March 23, 2017 */
  

  /* ICYMI - Dirty fix for showing specific logo on ICYMI page */
  var newthispath = "node";
  if(newthispath == 'node/509359'){
    var asd = $("#logo img").attr('src');
    var newsrc = '/sites/default/files/field/image/icymi/ICYMI_logo.png';
    $('#logo img').attr('src', '/sites/default/files/field/image/icymi/ICYMI_logo.png');
  }

  /*  Religion  Taxonomy Term Page - Dec 27, 2016 - Chi Rilo */
  /*if( newthispath == 'taxonomy/term/3743' ) {
    var asd = $("#logo img").attr('src');
    var newsrc = '/sites/default/files/field/image/religion/religion-logo.png';
    $('#logo img').attr('src', '/sites/default/files/field/image/religion/religion-logo-black.png');
  }*/


  /* Slick Slideshow Thumbnail and Caption Link - Chirilo September 19, 2016 */
  $('#slick-views-slideshow-1-thumbnail .slick-list div.slick__slide').each(function(){
      $(this).on('click', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
      });
      $(this).on('dblclick', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
        var link = 'http://www.sunstar.com.ph'+$(this).children('a').attr('href');
        window.open(
          link,
          '_blank' // <- This is what makes it open in a new window.
        );
      });
  });

  /* Disqus - This is the script which loads the Disqus comments/comments thread on element show-comments click - Chirilo September 9, 2016 */
  $('.show-comments').on('click', function(){
      // show fb and disclaimer
      $('.fb-comments').show();

      var disqus_shortname = 'sunstarphilippines'; // Replace this value with *your* username.

      // ajax request to load the disqus javascript
      $.ajax({
        type: "GET",
        url: "http://" + disqus_shortname + ".disqus.com/embed.js",
        dataType: "script",
        cache: true
      });
      // hide the button once comments load
      $(this).fadeOut();
  });

  
  /* animate showing of nav header to avoid showing placing of elements dynamically - Chi Jan 20, 2017 */
  $('#nav_desktop').hide();
  setTimeout(function(){
      if( $('#nav_desktop').is(':hidden') ) {
        $('#nav_desktop').fadeIn('slow');

        /*$('#block-dfp-1b99f74c7ce6a32e1d06c4c0bd684f02').css('text-align', 'center');
        $('#block-dfp-caf1362dfad37c56de57d5dcad89cb63').css({'text-align': 'center', 'margin-top':'10px', 'padding':'0px'});*/        
      }
  },3000);


  
  setTimeout(function(){
      $('#block-dfp-caf1362dfad37c56de57d5dcad89cb63').css({'text-align': 'center', 'margin-top':'10px', 'padding':'0px'});
      $('#block-dfp-caf1362dfad37c56de57d5dcad89cb63').fadeIn('slow');
      
      $('#block-dfp-1b99f74c7ce6a32e1d06c4c0bd684f02').css('text-align', 'center');
      $('#block-dfp-1b99f74c7ce6a32e1d06c4c0bd684f02').fadeIn('slow');

      /* DFP tag: Right_Content_Cebu_300x250' block */
      $('#block-dfp-right-content-cebu-300x250').css({'text-align': 'center', 'margin-top':'10px', 'padding':'0px'});
      $('#block-dfp-right-content-cebu-300x250').fadeIn('slow');

      /* DFP tag: Right_Content_LandingPages_300x250 block */
      $('#block-dfp-223c3124b8be6236d33ca5c7b7d28f87').css({'text-align': 'center', 'margin-top':'10px', 'padding':'0px 0px 20px 0px'});
      $('#block-dfp-223c3124b8be6236d33ca5c7b7d28f87').fadeIn('slow');
      
    
  },3000);


  var mediaQueryTemplate = '\
  @media (max-width:767px) { \
      #nav_desktop{ display: none !important } \
  } \
  ';


});
</script>

    infinite: false,

    responsive: [
      {
        breakpoint: 1024,
        settings: {
          slidesToShow: 4,
          slidesToScroll: 4,
          infinite: true
        }
      },
      {
        breakpoint: 600,
        settings: {
          slidesToShow: 3,
          slidesToScroll: 3

        breakpoint: 480,
        settings: {
          slidesToShow: 2,
          slidesToScroll: 2
        }

  });

	/* ============================= carousel ============================= */
	function displayTitles(){
		var Contianer = $("#lnscrsl_main_container .main_slides .title_Container");
		Contianer.css({ 'margin-top': '-' + Contianer.outerHeight() + 'px' });
		
		$("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.first .title_Container").css({ 'margin-top': '-' + $("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.first .title_Container").outerHeight() + 'px' });
		$("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.second .title_Container").css({ 'margin-top': '-' + $("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.second .title_Container").outerHeight() + 'px' });
		$("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.third .title_Container").css({ 'margin-top': '-' + $("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.third .title_Container").outerHeight() + 'px' });
		$("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.forth .title_Container").css({ 'margin-top': '-' + $("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.forth .title_Container").outerHeight() + 'px' });
		$("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.fifth .title_Container").css({ 'margin-top': '-' + $("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.fifth .title_Container").outerHeight() + 'px' });
	}

	function rotateLnsCrsl() {
		var myStringArray = LnsCrslGetAllContent();
		var arrayLength = myStringArray.length;
		for (var i = 0; i < arrayLength; i++) {
			if (i == 1){
				LnsCrslthumbsToMain(myStringArray[i]);
			}
			else {
				LnsCrslMainTothumbs(myStringArray[i], i);
			}
		}
		setTimeout(function() {
			$("#lnscrsl_main_container .placeHolder").removeClass('NewSlidingContent');
			$("#lnscrsl_main_container .placeHolder.OldSlides").remove();
		}, 1500);		
	}

	function LnsCrslGetAllContent(){
		$("#lnscrsl_main_container .main_slides .placeHolder").addClass('OldSlides');
		$("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides .placeHolder").addClass('OldSlides');
		var o = new Array();
			o[0] = $("#lnscrsl_main_container .main_slides .placeHolder").html();
			
			if ($("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.first .placeHolder").length) {
				o[1] = $("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.first .placeHolder").html();
			}
			if ($("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.second .placeHolder").length) {
				o[2] = $("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.second .placeHolder").html();
			}
			if ($("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.third .placeHolder").length) {
				o[3] = $("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.third .placeHolder").html();
			}
			if ($("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.forth .placeHolder").length) {
				o[4] = $("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.forth .placeHolder").html();
			}
			if ($("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.fifth .placeHolder").length) {
				o[5] = $("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.fifth .placeHolder").html();
			}
			//$("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.third .placeHolder").html(),
			//$("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.forth .placeHolder").html(),
			//$("#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.fifth .placeHolder").html(),
		return o;
	}

	function LnsCrslMainTothumbs(stringContent, Items){
		var elems = '#lnscrsl_main_container .thumbs_slides.';
		
		if(Items === 0){ 
			if ( $(elems + 'fifth').length ) { HTMLELEM = 'fifth'; }
			else if ( $(elems + 'forth').length ) { HTMLELEM = 'forth'; }
			else if ( $(elems + 'third').length ) { HTMLELEM = 'third'; }
			else if ( $(elems + 'second').length ) { HTMLELEM = 'second'; }
			else if ( $(elems + 'first').length ) { HTMLELEM = 'first'; }
		}
		else {
			if(Items === 2){ HTMLELEM = 'first'; }
			else if(Items === 3){ HTMLELEM = 'second'; }
			else if(Items === 4){ HTMLELEM = 'third'; }
			else if(Items === 5){ HTMLELEM = 'forth'; }
		}
		var elem = elems + HTMLELEM;
		console.log(elem);
		$(elem).prepend("<div class='placeHolder NewSlidingContent' style='left: -250px;'>" + stringContent + "</div>");		
		$(elem + " .OldSlides").css({ 'top': '-157px' });
		$(elem + ' .OldSlides').stop().animate({left: '250px'}, 700);
		$(elem + ' .NewSlidingContent').stop().animate({left: '0px'}, 700);
		$(elem + " .title_Container").css({ 'margin-top': '-' + $(elem + " .title_Container").outerHeight() + 'px' });
	}
	function LnsCrslthumbsToMain(stringContent){
		$('#lnscrsl_main_container .main_slides').prepend("<div class='placeHolder NewSlidingContent' style='left: -519px;'>" + stringContent + "</div>");		
		$("#lnscrsl_main_container .main_slides .OldSlides").css({ 'top': '-335px' });
		$('#lnscrsl_main_container .main_slides .OldSlides').stop().animate({left: '519px'}, 700);
		$('#lnscrsl_main_container .main_slides .NewSlidingContent').stop().animate({left: '0px'}, 700);
		$("#lnscrsl_main_container .main_slides .title_Container").css({ 'margin-top': '-' + $("#lnscrsl_main_container .main_slides .title_Container").outerHeight() + 'px' });
	}
	
	function resizeMainSlide() {
		$("#lnscrsl_main_container .main_slides").css({ 
			'width': '100%',
			'height': '100%',
		});
	}

	var nowRotating;
	$('document').ready(function(){
		displayTitles();
		if (6 > 1) { LnsCrslrotator(); $("#lnscrsl_main_container").mouseover(function(){ clearInterval(nowRotating); }); $("#lnscrsl_main_container").mouseout(function(){ LnsCrslrotator(); }); } else { resizeMainSlide(); } }); function LnsCrslrotator(){ nowRotating = setInterval(function(){ rotateLnsCrsl(); }, 10000); } /* ============================= end carousel ============================= */ </script> 
 <script>
     $(document).ready(function() {
     
      $(".owl-carousel-gallery").owlCarousel({
        items: 1,
        loop:true,
        margin:1,
        itemsDesktop : [1000,4], //5 items between 1000px and 901px
        itemsDesktopSmall : [900,4], // betweem 900px and 601px
        itemsTablet: [600,4], //2 items between 600 and 0
        itemsMobile:   [479,4],
        scrollPerPage: 1,
        autoPlay: true,
        stopOnHover: true,
        pagination: false,
      });
      var owl_event = $(".owl-carousel-gallery");
	/*
      $('.owl-carousel-control-gallery .fa').click(function(){
        if($(this).hasClass('fa-caret-left')) {
            owl_event.prev()   // Go to previous slide
        }
        else if($(this).hasClass('fa-caret-right')) {
            owl_event.next()   // Go to next slide
        }
      });
	*/
		$(".custom-owl-carousel-control .fa-caret-left.gallery").click(function(){
			owl_event.trigger('owl.prev');
		})
		$(".custom-owl-carousel-control .fa-caret-right.gallery").click(function(){
			owl_event.trigger('owl.next');
		})	  
    });
 </script>
 
 <script>
    setTimeout(function(){
         $(document).ready(function() {
     
              $(".owl-carousel-event").owlCarousel({
                items: 4,
                loop:true,
                margin:1,
                itemsDesktop : [1000,4], //5 items between 1000px and 901px
                itemsDesktopSmall : [900,4], // betweem 900px and 601px
                itemsTablet: [600,4], //2 items between 600 and 0
                itemsMobile:   [479,4],
                scrollPerPage: 4,
                autoPlay: true,
                stopOnHover: true,
                pagination: false,
              });
              var owl_event = $(".owl-carousel-event").data('owlCarousel');

              $('.owl-carousel-control-event .fa').click(function(){
                if($(this).hasClass('fa-caret-left')) {
                    owl_event.prev()   // Go to previous slide
                }
                else if($(this).hasClass('fa-caret-right')) {
                    owl_event.next()   // Go to next slide
                }
              });   
            });

    },1000);
    
 </script>
  	</body>
</html>

    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).on('copy', function(e)
    {
      var sel = window.getSelection();
      var copyFooter = 
            "<br /><br /> Read more: <a href='" + document.location.href + "'>" + document.location.href + "</a><br />Follow us: @sunstaronline on Twitter | SunStar Philippines on Facebook";
      var copyHolder = $('<div>', {html: sel+copyFooter, style: {position: 'absolute', left: '-99999px'}});
      $('body').append(copyHolder);
      sel.selectAllChildren( copyHolder[0] );
      window.setTimeout(function() {
          copyHolder.remove();
      },0);
    });
    </script>
  
<script type="text/javascript">
$( document ).ready(function() {

  /* Open new tab when Menu is clicked - Chirilo July 8, 2017 */
  $('#main-navigation ul.menu li a.sf-depth-2').on('click', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();
    $(this).attr('target', '_blank');
    window.open( $(this).attr('href') );
  });

  $('.slider-for').slick({
    slidesToShow: 1,
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    arrows: false,
    fade: true,
    asNavFor: '.slider-nav'
  });
  $('.slider-nav').slick({
    slidesToShow: 3,
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    asNavFor: '.slider-for',
    dots: true,
    centerMode: true,
    focusOnSelect: true
  });

  //console.log(document.location.href+'feature');

  /*  UPDATED - Stopped implementation - Chirilo March 14, 2017 */
  /* Check if url if <front> if true, show ICYMI popup  - Chirilo Nov 4, 2016*/
  //if(window.location.href.indexOf("/") > -1 || window.location.href.indexOf("latest-news") > -1 ) {
  
  //console.log(thiscurrentpath);
  /* UPDATED - ICYMI Removal to be replaced with Mobile Ambient Ad - Chirilo March 23, 2017 */
  //var isfrontpage = '';
    // if on  mobile, show icymi pop up - Chirilo March 23, 2017
    //if( isfrontpage === 'yes' && isfrontpage !== null ){
    var thiscurrentpath = "node/404755";
    if( thiscurrentpath === 'taxonomy/term/6' || thiscurrentpath === 'taxonomy/term/12' || thiscurrentpath === 'taxonomy/term/13' ) {
    
      var popupstate = localStorage.getCacheItem("popUpState");
      
      //if(localStorage.getItem('popState') != 'shown'){
        if( popupstate == null ){
          $('.various').removeAttr('style');
          $(".various").fancybox({
            maxWidth  : 360,
            maxHeight : 700,
            fitToView : true,
            width   : '360px',
            height    : '100%',
            autoSize  : true,
            closeClick  : false,
            openEffect  : 'none',
            closeEffect : 'none'
          });
          $(".various").click();

          $('.various a').each(function(){
            $(this).attr('style', 'cursor: pointer;');
            $(this).on('click', function(e){
              e.preventDefault();
              var this_url = $(this).attr('href');
              window.open(this_url);
              $('.fancybox-close').trigger('click');
            });
          });
          localStorage.setCacheItem("popUpState", "shown", { days: 1 });
      }
      // Add event handle for the ICYMI quicktab to redirect to url=/icymi on click - Chirilo Nov 7, 2016
      $('#quicktabs-tab-custom_channel_qt-0').on('click', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
        var thisquicktab = $(this).text();
        var icymiurl = $(location).attr('href')+'icymi';
        
        if( thisquicktab === "In Case You Missed It" ){
          window.open(icymiurl);
        }
      });

      // close this dialog after 5 seconds - Chirilo 
      setTimeout(function(){
        $('.fancybox-close').trigger('click');
      }, 5000);
    }
  /* EOF: UPDATED - ICYMI Removal to be replaced with Mobile Ambient Ad - Chirilo March 23, 2017 */
  

  /* ICYMI - Dirty fix for showing specific logo on ICYMI page */
  var newthispath = "node/404755";
  if(newthispath == 'node/509359'){
    var asd = $("#logo img").attr('src');
    var newsrc = '/sites/default/files/field/image/icymi/ICYMI_logo.png';
    $('#logo img').attr('src', '/sites/default/files/field/image/icymi/ICYMI_logo.png');
  }

  /*  Religion  Taxonomy Term Page - Dec 27, 2016 - Chi Rilo */
  /*if( newthispath == 'taxonomy/term/3743' ) {
    var asd = $("#logo img").attr('src');
    var newsrc = '/sites/default/files/field/image/religion/religion-logo.png';
    $('#logo img').attr('src', '/sites/default/files/field/image/religion/religion-logo-black.png');
  }*/


  /* Slick Slideshow Thumbnail and Caption Link - Chirilo September 19, 2016 */
  $('#slick-views-slideshow-1-thumbnail .slick-list div.slick__slide').each(function(){
      $(this).on('click', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
      });
      $(this).on('dblclick', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
        var link = 'http://www.sunstar.com.ph'+$(this).children('a').attr('href');
        window.open(
          link,
          '_blank' // <- This is what makes it open in a new window.
        );
      });
  });

  /* Disqus - This is the script which loads the Disqus comments/comments thread on element show-comments click - Chirilo September 9, 2016 */
  $('.show-comments').on('click', function(){
      // show fb and disclaimer
      $('.fb-comments').show();

      var disqus_shortname = 'sunstarphilippines'; // Replace this value with *your* username.

      // ajax request to load the disqus javascript
      $.ajax({
        type: "GET",
        url: "http://" + disqus_shortname + ".disqus.com/embed.js",
        dataType: "script",
        cache: true
      });
      // hide the button once comments load
      $(this).fadeOut();
  });

  
  /* animate showing of nav header to avoid showing placing of elements dynamically - Chi Jan 20, 2017 */
  $('#nav_desktop').hide();
  setTimeout(function(){
      if( $('#nav_desktop').is(':hidden') ) {
        $('#nav_desktop').fadeIn('slow');

        /*$('#block-dfp-1b99f74c7ce6a32e1d06c4c0bd684f02').css('text-align', 'center');
        $('#block-dfp-caf1362dfad37c56de57d5dcad89cb63').css({'text-align': 'center', 'margin-top':'10px', 'padding':'0px'});*/        
      }
  },3000);


  
  setTimeout(function(){
      $('#block-dfp-caf1362dfad37c56de57d5dcad89cb63').css({'text-align': 'center', 'margin-top':'10px', 'padding':'0px'});
      $('#block-dfp-caf1362dfad37c56de57d5dcad89cb63').fadeIn('slow');
      
      $('#block-dfp-1b99f74c7ce6a32e1d06c4c0bd684f02').css('text-align', 'center');
      $('#block-dfp-1b99f74c7ce6a32e1d06c4c0bd684f02').fadeIn('slow');

  @media (max-width:767px) { \
      #nav_desktop{ display: none !important } \
  } \
  ';


});

<div id="block-views-countr-news-block" class="block block-views clearfix">

    <h2 class="title">Country News</h2>
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="view view-countr-news view-id-countr_news view-display-id-block view-dom-id-ff5b3f32ec1663c719286636f55b5ef7">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
      <table class="views-view-grid cols-2">
  
  <tbody>
          <tr class="row-1 row-first">
                  <td class="col-1 col-first">
              
  <div class="views-field views-field-name">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/taxonomy/term/15">Bacolod</a></span>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-view">        <span class="field-content"><div class="view view-country-embed view-id-country_embed view-display-id-default view-dom-id-f44ea9889a104ec53613a54851a32174">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first custom-item-list">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-title">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/bacolod/local-news/2017/09/15/negros-occidental-presents-agenda-rdc-western-visayas-564272">Negros Occidental presents agenda to RDC-Western Visayas</a></span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even custom-item-list">
