    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).on('copy', function(e)
    {
      var sel = window.getSelection();
      var copyFooter = 
            "<br /><br /> Read more: <a href='" + document.location.href + "'>" + document.location.href + "</a><br />Follow us: @sunstaronline on Twitter | SunStar Philippines on Facebook";
      var copyHolder = $('<div>', {html: sel+copyFooter, style: {position: 'absolute', left: '-99999px'}});
      $('body').append(copyHolder);
      sel.selectAllChildren( copyHolder[0] );
      window.setTimeout(function() {
          copyHolder.remove();
      },0);
    });
    </script>
  
<script type="text/javascript">
$( document ).ready(function() {

  /* Open new tab when Menu is clicked - Chirilo July 8, 2017 */
  $('#main-navigation ul.menu li a.sf-depth-2').on('click', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();
    $(this).attr('target', '_blank');
    window.open( $(this).attr('href') );
  });

  $('.slider-for').slick({
    slidesToShow: 1,
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    arrows: false,
    fade: true,
    asNavFor: '.slider-nav'
  });
  $('.slider-nav').slick({
    slidesToShow: 3,
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    asNavFor: '.slider-for',
    dots: true,
    centerMode: true,
    focusOnSelect: true
  });

  //console.log(document.location.href+'feature');

  /*  UPDATED - Stopped implementation - Chirilo March 14, 2017 */
  /* Check if url if <front> if true, show ICYMI popup  - Chirilo Nov 4, 2016*/
  //if(window.location.href.indexOf("/") > -1 || window.location.href.indexOf("latest-news") > -1 ) {
  
  //console.log(thiscurrentpath);
  /* UPDATED - ICYMI Removal to be replaced with Mobile Ambient Ad - Chirilo March 23, 2017 */
  //var isfrontpage = '';
    // if on  mobile, show icymi pop up - Chirilo March 23, 2017
    //if( isfrontpage === 'yes' && isfrontpage !== null ){
    var thiscurrentpath = "node/404755";
    if( thiscurrentpath === 'taxonomy/term/6' || thiscurrentpath === 'taxonomy/term/12' || thiscurrentpath === 'taxonomy/term/13' ) {
    
      var popupstate = localStorage.getCacheItem("popUpState");
      
      //if(localStorage.getItem('popState') != 'shown'){
        if( popupstate == null ){
          $('.various').removeAttr('style');
          $(".various").fancybox({
            maxWidth  : 360,
            maxHeight : 700,
            fitToView : true,
            width   : '360px',
            height    : '100%',
            autoSize  : true,
            closeClick  : false,
            openEffect  : 'none',
            closeEffect : 'none'
          });
          $(".various").click();

          $('.various a').each(function(){
            $(this).attr('style', 'cursor: pointer;');
            $(this).on('click', function(e){
              e.preventDefault();
              var this_url = $(this).attr('href');
              window.open(this_url);
              $('.fancybox-close').trigger('click');
            });
          });
          localStorage.setCacheItem("popUpState", "shown", { days: 1 });
      }
      // Add event handle for the ICYMI quicktab to redirect to url=/icymi on click - Chirilo Nov 7, 2016
      $('#quicktabs-tab-custom_channel_qt-0').on('click', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
        var thisquicktab = $(this).text();
        var icymiurl = $(location).attr('href')+'icymi';
        
        if( thisquicktab === "In Case You Missed It" ){
          window.open(icymiurl);
        }
      });

      // close this dialog after 5 seconds - Chirilo 
      setTimeout(function(){
        $('.fancybox-close').trigger('click');
      }, 5000);
    }
  /* EOF: UPDATED - ICYMI Removal to be replaced with Mobile Ambient Ad - Chirilo March 23, 2017 */
  

  /* ICYMI - Dirty fix for showing specific logo on ICYMI page */
  var newthispath = "node/404755";
  if(newthispath == 'node/509359'){
    var asd = $("#logo img").attr('src');
    var newsrc = '/sites/default/files/field/image/icymi/ICYMI_logo.png';
    $('#logo img').attr('src', '/sites/default/files/field/image/icymi/ICYMI_logo.png');
  }

  /*  Religion  Taxonomy Term Page - Dec 27, 2016 - Chi Rilo */
  /*if( newthispath == 'taxonomy/term/3743' ) {
    var asd = $("#logo img").attr('src');
    var newsrc = '/sites/default/files/field/image/religion/religion-logo.png';
    $('#logo img').attr('src', '/sites/default/files/field/image/religion/religion-logo-black.png');
  }*/


  /* Slick Slideshow Thumbnail and Caption Link - Chirilo September 19, 2016 */
  $('#slick-views-slideshow-1-thumbnail .slick-list div.slick__slide').each(function(){
      $(this).on('click', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
      });
      $(this).on('dblclick', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
        var link = 'http://www.sunstar.com.ph'+$(this).children('a').attr('href');
        window.open(
          link,
          '_blank' // <- This is what makes it open in a new window.
        );
      });
  });

  /* Disqus - This is the script which loads the Disqus comments/comments thread on element show-comments click - Chirilo September 9, 2016 */
  $('.show-comments').on('click', function(){
      // show fb and disclaimer
      $('.fb-comments').show();

      var disqus_shortname = 'sunstarphilippines'; // Replace this value with *your* username.

      // ajax request to load the disqus javascript
      $.ajax({
        type: "GET",
        url: "http://" + disqus_shortname + ".disqus.com/embed.js",
        dataType: "script",
        cache: true
      });
      // hide the button once comments load
      $(this).fadeOut();
  });

  
  /* animate showing of nav header to avoid showing placing of elements dynamically - Chi Jan 20, 2017 */
  $('#nav_desktop').hide();
  setTimeout(function(){
      if( $('#nav_desktop').is(':hidden') ) {
        $('#nav_desktop').fadeIn('slow');

        /*$('#block-dfp-1b99f74c7ce6a32e1d06c4c0bd684f02').css('text-align', 'center');
        $('#block-dfp-caf1362dfad37c56de57d5dcad89cb63').css({'text-align': 'center', 'margin-top':'10px', 'padding':'0px'});*/        
      }
  },3000);


  
  setTimeout(function(){
      $('#block-dfp-caf1362dfad37c56de57d5dcad89cb63').css({'text-align': 'center', 'margin-top':'10px', 'padding':'0px'});
      $('#block-dfp-caf1362dfad37c56de57d5dcad89cb63').fadeIn('slow');
      
      $('#block-dfp-1b99f74c7ce6a32e1d06c4c0bd684f02').css('text-align', 'center');
      $('#block-dfp-1b99f74c7ce6a32e1d06c4c0bd684f02').fadeIn('slow');

      /* DFP tag: Right_Content_Cebu_300x250' block */

      $('#block-dfp-right-content-cebu-300x250').fadeIn('slow');

      /* DFP tag: Right_Content_LandingPages_300x250 block */

  },3000);


  var mediaQueryTemplate = '\
  @media (max-width:767px) { \
      #nav_desktop{ display: none !important } \
  } \
  ';


});

id="like_box_button_container_257" class="fbl_animation_time none">
<iframe
class="iframe_class_257" src="https://www.facebook.com/plugins/page.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.facebook.com%2FTheDailyGuardian&tabs=timeline,,&width=260&height=350&small_header=false&adapt_container_width=true&hide_cover=false&locale=en_GB&show_facepile=true" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowTransparency="true"></iframe><div
class="like-button-div">
<iframe
class="iframe_like_button_257" src="https://www.facebook.com/plugins/like.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.facebook.com%2FTheDailyGuardian&width=260&layout=standard&size=small&locale=en_GB&action=like&share=true" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowTransparency="true">
</iframe></div></div> <script type="text/javascript">jQuery(".tooltips").tooltip_tip({placement: "right"});
   var ajaxurl = "https://thedailyguardian.net/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php";

   jQuery("[data-media-popup-close]").on("click", function (e)
   {
      jQuery("[data-popup=ux_open_popup_media_button]").fadeOut(350);
      e.preventDefault();
   });
   function show_pop_up_facebook_likebox()
   {
      jQuery("[data-media-popup-open]").on("click", function (e)
      {
         jQuery("[data-popup=ux_open_popup_media_button]").fadeIn(350);
         e.preventDefault();
      });
   }
   function like_box_type()
   {
      var like_box_type_data = jQuery("#ux_ddl_layout_likebox").val();
      jQuery.post(ajaxurl,
              {
                 type: like_box_type_data,
                 param: "facebook_likebox_shortcode_module",
                 action: "facebook_likebox_frontend_ajax_call",
                 _wp_nonce: ""
              },
              function (data)
              {
                 jQuery("#ux_ddl_layout_title").html(data);
              });
   }
   function insert_like_box()
   {
      var value = jQuery("#ux_ddl_layout_likebox").val();
      var fbl_id = jQuery("#ux_ddl_layout_title").val();
      var case_type = "";
      switch (value)
      {
         case "add_like_box_settings":
            case_type = "like_box";
            break;
         case "add_like_button_settings":
            case_type = "like_button";
            break;
         case "like_box_and_button_settings":
            case_type = "like_box_button";
            break;
      }
      var shortcode = "[facebook_likebox case_type=\"" + case_type + "\" " + "fbl_id=\"" + fbl_id + "\"][/facebook_likebox]";
      if (window.CKEDITOR)
      {
         CKEDITOR.instances["content"].insertHtml(shortcode + "\r\n");
      } else
      {
         window.send_to_editor(shortcode + "\r\n");
      }
      jQuery("[data-popup=ux_open_popup_media_button]").fadeOut(350);
   }
   function fbl_validate_fields()
   {
      var likebox_type = jQuery("#ux_ddl_layout_likebox").val();
      var likebox = jQuery("#ux_ddl_layout_title").val();
      if (likebox_type === "")
      {
         var shortCutFunction = jQuery("#toastTypeGroup_error input:checked").val();
         toastr[shortCutFunction]("Please Choose a Like Box Type");
         return;
      } else
      {
         like_box_type();
      }
      if (likebox === "")
      {
         var shortCutFunction = jQuery("#toastTypeGroup_error input:checked").val();
         toastr[shortCutFunction]("Please Choose a Like Box");
         return;
      }
      insert_like_box();
   }
   jQuery(document).ready(function ()
   {
      show_pop_up_facebook_likebox();
   });</script> </div>

id="like_box_button_container_257" class="fbl_animation_time none">
<iframe
class="iframe_class_257" src="https://www.facebook.com/plugins/page.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.facebook.com%2FTheDailyGuardian&tabs=timeline,,&width=260&height=350&small_header=false&adapt_container_width=true&hide_cover=false&locale=en_GB&show_facepile=true" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowTransparency="true"></iframe><div
class="like-button-div">
<iframe
class="iframe_like_button_257" src="https://www.facebook.com/plugins/like.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.facebook.com%2FTheDailyGuardian&width=260&layout=standard&size=small&locale=en_GB&action=like&share=true" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowTransparency="true">
</iframe></div></div> <script type="text/javascript">jQuery(".tooltips").tooltip_tip({placement: "right"});
   var ajaxurl = "https://thedailyguardian.net/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php";

   jQuery("[data-media-popup-close]").on("click", function (e)
   {
      jQuery("[data-popup=ux_open_popup_media_button]").fadeOut(350);
      e.preventDefault();
   });
   function show_pop_up_facebook_likebox()
   {
      jQuery("[data-media-popup-open]").on("click", function (e)
      {
         jQuery("[data-popup=ux_open_popup_media_button]").fadeIn(350);
         e.preventDefault();
      });
   }
   function like_box_type()
   {
      var like_box_type_data = jQuery("#ux_ddl_layout_likebox").val();
      jQuery.post(ajaxurl,
              {
                 type: like_box_type_data,
                 param: "facebook_likebox_shortcode_module",
                 action: "facebook_likebox_frontend_ajax_call",
                 _wp_nonce: ""
              },
              function (data)
              {
                 jQuery("#ux_ddl_layout_title").html(data);
              });
   }
   function insert_like_box()
   {
      var value = jQuery("#ux_ddl_layout_likebox").val();
      var fbl_id = jQuery("#ux_ddl_layout_title").val();
      var case_type = "";
      switch (value)
      {
         case "add_like_box_settings":
            case_type = "like_box";
            break;
         case "add_like_button_settings":
            case_type = "like_button";
            break;
         case "like_box_and_button_settings":
            case_type = "like_box_button";
            break;
      }
      var shortcode = "[facebook_likebox case_type=\"" + case_type + "\" " + "fbl_id=\"" + fbl_id + "\"][/facebook_likebox]";
      if (window.CKEDITOR)
      {
         CKEDITOR.instances["content"].insertHtml(shortcode + "\r\n");
      } else
      {
         window.send_to_editor(shortcode + "\r\n");
      }
      jQuery("[data-popup=ux_open_popup_media_button]").fadeOut(350);
   }
   function fbl_validate_fields()
   {
      var likebox_type = jQuery("#ux_ddl_layout_likebox").val();
      var likebox = jQuery("#ux_ddl_layout_title").val();
      if (likebox_type === "")
      {
         var shortCutFunction = jQuery("#toastTypeGroup_error input:checked").val();
         toastr[shortCutFunction]("Please Choose a Like Box Type");
         return;
      } else
      {
         like_box_type();
      }
      if (likebox === "")
      {
         var shortCutFunction = jQuery("#toastTypeGroup_error input:checked").val();
         toastr[shortCutFunction]("Please Choose a Like Box");
         return;
      }
      insert_like_box();
   }
   jQuery(document).ready(function ()
   {
      show_pop_up_facebook_likebox();
   });</script> </div>

      <p>Seven school-based tribes will compete in the 2010 Tultugan Festival cultural showcase of Maasin, Iloilo tomorrow, December 29.</p>
      <h2><a href="2010/12/28/region.6.tourist.arrivals.steadily.increasing.dot.html">Region 6 tourist arrivals steadily increasing&ndash;DOT</a></h2>
      <p>Tourism Regional Director Edwin Trompeta said tourists continue to arrive in Western Visayas and their number have been steadily going up despite the events in the past year that gave negative image to the Philippines.</p>
      <h2><a href="2010/12/28/2.carnapping.cases.reported.html">2 carnapping cases reported</a></h2>
      <p>Two carnapping incidents were reported to the Iloilo Police Provincial Office in the middle of December.</p>
      <h2><a href="2010/12/28/officials.seek.inclusion.of.boracay.in.peso.bills.html">Officials seek inclusion of Boracay in peso bills</a></h2>
      <p>The Municipal Council of Malay, Aklan will come up with a resolution requesting the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP) to include the picture of Boracay Island in the new bank notes it is producing.</p>
      <h2><a href="2010/12/28/former.village.chief.tagged.in.strafing.of.brods.house.html">Former village chief tagged in strafing of brod&rsquo;s house      </a></h2>
      <p>A former village chief was accused of strafing his own brother&rsquo;s house on Christmas day at Brgy. West Habog-Habog, Molo, Iloilo City.</p>

      <p>ROXAS CITY &ndash; The Department of Trade and Industry has been intensifying its monitoring activities during the holidays ensure that consumers are well-protected.</p>

      <p>ROXAS CITY &ndash; Libas village chief Richard Arrojado urged his predecessor to join hands with him to attain peace and order that would stop the series of killings involving their supporters.</p>

      <p>The Department of Environment and Natural Resources (DENR) has asked Filipinos to eradicate or minimize the use of firecrackers in celebrating the New Year&rsquo;s Eve this coming Friday.</p>
      <h2><a href="2010/12/29/online.verification.of.professionals.launched.html">Online verification of professionals launched</a></h2>
      <p>The Department of Labor and Employment&rsquo;s Professional Regulation Commission&rsquo;s campaign against fraudulent documents and fake professionals has intensified with the launching of a system that would allow an employer, or any interested person, to verify online whether a certain professional is licensed or not.</p>

      <p>Exports of coconut oil and other coconut by-products reached an unprecedented level of $1.57 billion, 78 per cent more than last year&rsquo;s value of $884 million, records of the Philippine Coconut Authority show.</p>

(PNOC-EC), the oil and gas exploration arm of state-owned Philippine National Oil Co., is awaiting the results of the Department of Energy&rsquo;s (DOE) review of all petroleum service contracts before it proceeds with the development of the Camago-Malampaya Oil Leg in northwest Palawan.</p>

      <h1>OPINION</h1>
      <div id="opinion">
        <h5>BOOK:</h5>

    <div class="stories">
      <div id="feature">
        <h1>FEATURES</h1>
        <img src="2010/12/29/race.to.the.sun_tn.jpg" alt="Race to the Sun" width="100" height="100" border="1" class="left" title="Race to the Sun"/>
        <h2><a href="2010/12/29/race.to.the.sun.html">Race to the Sun</a></h2>
        <p>Another early weekend morning rolled around with 346 enthusiastic runners who took over half of the road from SM City to Promenade. A Pro-health Fun Run: Race to the Sun with a 3-kilometer and 5-kilometer race was organized by the Council of the Rotaract Clubs,</p>
        <img src="images/separator.gif" alt="----------------------------------------" width="400" height="1" /><img src="2010/12/29/tilipunan.center_tn.jpg" alt="Tilipunan Center Celebrates 30th Anniversary" width="100" height="100" border="1" class="left" title="Tilipunan Center Celebrates 30th Anniversary"/>
        <h2><a href="2010/12/29/tilipunan.center.celebrates.30th.anniversary.html">Tilipunan Center Celebrates 30th Anniversary</a></h2>
        <p>In the last 30 years, the Tilipunan Center in Tanza served as a center for learning for kids as well a venue for livelihood training of adults living within the barangay. This is a project of the Zonta Iloilo City Club I.</p>
        <img src="images/separator.gif" alt="----------------------------------------" width="400" height="1" />        <img src="2010/12/28/amigo.plaza.mall.grants.christmas.wishes_tn.jpg" alt="Amigo Plaza Mall grants Christmas wishes" width="100" height="100" border="1" class="left" title="Amigo Plaza Mall grants Christmas wishes"/>
        <h2><a href="2010/12/28/amigo.plaza.mall.grants.christmas.wishes.html">Amigo Plaza Mall grants Christmas wishes</a></h2>
        <p>THE Amigo Plaza Mall, a member of La Filipina Uygongco Corporation group of companies, launched the project &ldquo;Paskwa sang Amigo, Hamdum mo, Tumanon Ko&rdquo; together with ABS-CBN Iloilo and Aksyon Radyo Iloilo.</p>
        <img src="images/separator.gif" alt="----------------------------------------" width="400" height="1" /><img src="2010/12/28/diether.ocampo_tn.jpg" alt="Diether Ocampo and &lsquo;Dalaw&rsquo;" width="100" height="100" border="1" class="left" title="Diether Ocampo and ‘Dalaw’"/>
        <h2><a href="2010/12/28/diether.ocampo.and.dalaw.html">Diether Ocampo and &lsquo;Dalaw&rsquo;</a></h2>
        <p>I was privileged to have interviewed Diether Ocampo before his, as expected, jam packed mall show where he promoted his current movie, Dalaw, which is currently one of the top grossers in the ongoing Metro Manila Film Festival.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
